title: Jericho Lawson
text:
jlawson01@smith.edu
 @jerichostats
 jericholawson

I am currently a Lecturer at Smith College. My research interests include high-dimensional variable selection, sports statistics, and deep learning. I am committed to providing student-centric and engaging statistical education to all backgrounds, as seen in courses such as Introduction to Statistical Computing, Sampling Surveys, and Introduction to Statistics. My current research aims to pinpoint useful abstract features within images for image classification through the knockoffs framework, called ImgKnock.

title: About this website
text: Original R Manuals can be found at https://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html. The manuals in this website are built automatically from the originals using Quarto. You can find the scripts that do the conversion at https://github.com/rstudio/r-manuals.
